colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @043B ('DI NI 'JAM DPAL MCHOG RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED CHEN PO'I RNAL 'BYOR GYI RGYUD LAS BSAM GTAN GYIS LAS SGRUB PA'I RTOG PA STE, BDUUN PA'O, , DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED CHEN PO'I 'KHOR LO RGYUD 'BUM PA NAS PHYUNG BA, RTOG PA'I PHYOGS BKLAGS PAS GRUB PA, DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED CHEN PO MA HE'I GDONG CAN @043B GYI DNGOS GRUB BSGRUB PA'I RTOG PA, DPAL AU RGYAN GYI GNAS CHEN PO NAS 'JAM DPAL GYI RGYUD LAS PHYUNG BA, RGYUD KYI RGYAL PO CHEN PO DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED CHEN PO ZHES BYA BA, BLA MA DAM PA, DKYIL 'KHOR CHEN PO'I SLOB DPON DPAL LA' LI TA BADZRAS PHYUNG NAS MDZAD PA RDZOGS SO,, ,,)
